title: FONY Web3 Music Player - Comprehensive Knowledge Base
description: Detailed information, features, tips, and commands to optimize your experience with FONY - the next-gen Web3 music player combining internet radio and NFT audio integration.

applicationOverview.summary: FONY combines free 24/7 internet radio streaming with NFT-based audio collectibles, wrapped in a user-friendly Web3 interface featuring smart playlists, AI-powered music advisor, and discovery tools to enhance your listening experience.

features.name: Internet Radio Streaming
features.description: Access thousands of curated radio stations across various genres worldwide, with seamless streaming and metadata display.

features.name: NFT Audio Integration
features.description: Connect your Ethereum-compatible wallet to access and play your owned NFT audio collectibles with metadata and cover art fetched from IPFS or Arweave.

features.name: Playback Controls
features.description: Use intuitive controls: Play/Pause, Next, Previous, Shuffle, Random, and Volume with smooth dragging and animated buttons.

features.name: Real-Time Equalizer Visualization
features.description: Visualize audio frequency bands dynamically with animated diods responding to the music.

features.name: AI Music Advisor & Discovery Tools
features.description: Get personalized music recommendations, similar tracks, facts, and new releases with AI-driven commands to explore music effortlessly.

features.name: Search Within Genres
features.description: Filter stations instantly by typing in the search box while browsing a genre.

features.name: Favorites Management
features.description: Mark stations as favorites, manage them easily, and quickly access your preferred streams.

features.name: Theme Support
features.description: Toggle between light and dark themes with adaptive icon sets for improved UX.

features.name: Responsive UI with Resizer
features.description: Adjust the split view between player and playlist panels via a draggable resizer, adaptable to screen size.

features.name: Secure Streaming and Metadata Fetching
features.description: Streams are proxied securely if using http sources, with ICY metadata fetching for current track display and Google search integration for track info.

features.name: OpenAI-Powered Chat Commands
features.description: Use chat commands like /similar, /facts, /new, /info to get AI-generated music recommendations and track details.

features.name: Discogs Integration with Rich Track Info
features.description: Fetch detailed track and release info from Discogs, including album art, label, genre, country, and year.

features.name: YouTube, Spotify & Tidal Search Links
features.description: Quick links to search the current track on YouTube, Spotify, and Tidal directly from the chat for easy access to music.

technicalDetails.volumeControl: Volume adjustable by dragging the knob on the volume slider, with visual feedback.
technicalDetails.equalizer: Uses Web Audio API AnalyserNode with 30 bars representing frequency bands for real-time animation.
technicalDetails.buffering: Streams proxied for http, buffering state managed with visual progress in playlist items.

web3.walletConnect: Connect via MetaMask or compatible Ethereum wallet.
web3.nftContracts: Supports predefined NFT contracts with metadata fetching via IPFS or Arweave gateways.
web3.trackPlayback: NFT tracks streamed similarly to radio, with track metadata and cover art displayed.

technicalDetails.chat: Built-in chat with OpenAI backend for advanced queries and user engagement.
technicalDetails.responsiveDesign: UI adapts to screen size with specific behavior for mobile devices.
